input.sentences: as we all gathered for band practice [male] warmed up his drums .
[male] adjusted the strings on his base guitar .
while [male] was adjusting his strings | [male] started a little beat .
[male] joined in with a little plucking .
finally we were ready to jam .

the guy started picking on the strings
